name: hobo-js
description: A little utility to generate html inside your js/ts code

scripts.build: npm run clean && tsc -d --project tsconfig.build.json && npm run bundle:esm && npm run bundle:esm:min && npm run bundle:umd && npm run bundle:umd:min
scripts.bundle:esm:min: terser --ecma 6 --compress --mangle --module -o dist/hobo.min.mjs -- dist/hobo.mjs && gzip -9 -c dist/hobo.min.mjs > dist/hobo.min.mjs.gz
scripts.bundle:umd:min: terser --ecma 6 --compress --mangle -o dist/hobo.umd.min.js -- dist/hobo.umd.js && gzip -9 -c dist/hobo.umd.min.js > dist/hobo.umd.min.js.gz

author: nombrekeff
